summary: When a rich but cantankerous dowager on an isolated estates hires an engaging handyman, her niece/companion becomes suspicious of his motives.
cast: Merle Tottenham|Kathleen Harrison|May Whitty|Rosalind Russell|Eily Malyon|Matthew Boulton|Robert Montgomery|Beryl Mercer|Alan Marshal|Winifred Harris|E.E. Clive|Nora Cecil|Larry Harris|P.J. Kelly|Florence Lawrence|Marjorie Prax
title: Al caer la noche
